name: ocbesbn-service-template
description: Provides a sekeleton template for OpusCapita Business Network services.
author: Christian Drengenberg <Christian.Drengenberg@opuscapita.com>

scripts.test: npm run clean ; npm run setup-consul ; ${NODE_PATH}/.bin/nyc ${NODE_PATH}/.bin/mocha --recursive -R mocha-junit-reporter
scripts.setup-consul: curl -X PUT -d 'bnp' http://${HOST_IP}:8500/v1/kv/{{your-service-name}}/db-init/database ; curl -X PUT -d 'root' http://${HOST_IP}:8500/v1/kv/{{your-service-name}}/db-init/user ; curl -X PUT -d 'notSecurePa55w0rd' http://${HOST_IP}:8500/v1/kv/{{your-service-name}}/db-init/password ; curl -X PUT -d 'true' http://${HOST_IP}:8500/v1/kv/{{your-service-name}}/db-init/populate-test-data
scripts.doc: npm run rest-doc ; npm run domain-doc ; npm run api-doc
